Posts.Content: hi Bollybees i had my first docetaxel hep and pert last wednesday and came away feeling ok  no sicky feeling  great.  after my fec session which left me with stomach cramps and sickness for 10 days i felt good. until sunday when i felt so ill. no temp but just stomachy, mouth felt swollen and just yuk. monday tuesday and today hit by joint pains so bad i couldnt walk well. my stomach was crampy and im off food. think it is that i was thinking that this is ok but pow he hit me. how long does this go on for. difficult as i live with my 25 year old and kerp asking for help from him but feel guilty.  feel a bit lonely as had a partner of 7 years who lives about 5 min away but think he cant cope and doesnt come roind very often and wont look at me or hold my hand or cuddle me. truing to keep positive but its hard. jenny
Posts.Title: Docetaxel, pertuzumab, trastuzumab

Posts.Content: Hi  I am having my second  fec chemo wednesday my first was not so good as I wasn't advised on omprazole or gaviscon until I had stomach pro lens. so will take it for second  but unsure whether you can take it on day of chemo ....i have their one to take an hour before ....anyone can advise please jenny
Posts.Title: *** April 2018 Breast Cancer Chemo Club ***

Posts.Content: Thinking of you Sammystaff, I hope you recover quickly  Jennyx
Posts.Title: *** April 2018 Breast Cancer Chemo Club ***

Posts.Content: Hi Judith jmp They have the main centre Pill in bristol but centers all over  if you go on their website its very informative ans suggested a great book (evidenced based )that is along the whole body philosophy called anti cancer a new way of life   Dr David Servan-Schreiber (i got mine off amazon)  and talks on diets, statistics (which is really interesting) exercise etc. It works with tradition medicine as he was a medic and ways they work together. Fantastic as i wanted to help myself.  Sorry if im making mistakes as i had my 2nd FEC yesterday so didnt get any sleep with the colic pains etc. Jenny
Posts.Title: *** April 2018 Breast Cancer Chemo Club ***

Posts.Content: Hi Peanut11 Thanks for advice. Think i will shave it as im eating it now yuk. Im in today for 2nd FEC. Looking at it not as toxic but something to make me better....bring it on :) I went to the Penny Brohn charity in Bristol on Monday. Brilliant resource centre in a non NHS environment but with Gps and oncologist ,dieticians etc available. I really relaxed there. They have centres all over uk and i will definetely use it again. They do a 2 night residential which again is all free, my cousin used it 20 years again and introduced me to it. jenny x
Posts.Title: *** April 2018 Breast Cancer Chemo Club ***

Posts.Content: Hi LizzieD58 I wish I was nearer as live 1.5 hours away but will definitely go back and try to get a few sessions in the day. they gave me more hope and clarity as I wanted to help myself. they suggested a great book which I have bought called anti cancer a new way of life by David servan Schreiber. which works on the same principals  as I have found some books in the past are not up to date or are too alternative. I'm resting today as had a bad night after my 2nd FEC you have a good day too jennyx

Posts.Title: *** April 2018 Breast Cancer Chemo Club ***

Posts.Content: Hi Leolady56 Gosh we are all told different things. I was told by the oncology dietitians that i could take a low dose of D3 max 400iu but avoid it 2 days before and 2 days after the chemo day as we need it and dont get a lot of sun. im avoiding everything else ie vit c as im hoping i getting that from pomegranate juice. I was also told about Herceptin being the bees knees and was not allowed it on FEC ans they can cause heart problems down the line but am starting it on my 4th session with Docetaxel and pertuzumab (which is supposed to be the new bees knees and different regions of bees!! This was prescribed by my initial oncologist but when i went to my first meeting I had another one who poo pood herceptin and the new drug , the breast care nurse spoke to me after as i came out so confused, She said they work very different but her experience of herceptin was that it was giving amazing results Anyone had experience of this lovely cocktail? Jennyx
Posts.Title: *** April 2018 Breast Cancer Chemo Club ***
